biocontainers.name: chewbbaca
biocontainers.summary: A complete suite for gene-by-gene schema creation and strain identification

biotools.summary: chewBBACA is a software suite for the creation and evaluation of core genome and whole genome MultiLocus Sequence Typing (cg/wgMLST) schemas and results.

bioschemas.name: chewBBaca
bioschemas.summary: chewBBACA is a software suite for the creation and evaluation of core genome and whole genome MultiLocus Sequence Typing (cg/wgMLST) schemas and results.
